name: DunGen ALPHA demo
description:
You can use DunGen to help play Tabletop RPGs!

I've been informed that DunGen comes up as a false-positive virus with some if not all anti-virus programs. DunGen is NOT a virus and its sole purpose is to allow people to play tabletop RPGs easier with friends. I'll be looking into fixing this issue.

With DunGen you can:

  • Create, save, and load battlemaps!
  • Keep track of initiative order(turn order)
  • Keep track of health of both creatures and players
  • Create, save and load customized player pieces!

Please remember that this is still in its alpha state and many things are liable to change in the future such as:

  • UI
  • Button layout
  • Tutorials
  • Custom pieces other than just player
  • Music
  • Online Connectivity

Should you find any bugs or have ideas that should be implemented in the future, you can submit them at https://www.reddit.com/r/DunGenTTRPG/
